0.1.3.name: wordpress/bbpress-admin
0.1.3.description:
The plugin will add bbpress admin sections to the wordpress admin section. That way the user will be able to manage both installation from a single admin section.

The plugin has been tested with bbpress 0.9.0.1

The sections from bbpress are moved into wordpress as follows:

  • bbPress Admin > Design > Themes moved to Wordpress Admin > Design > BBPress Theme
  • bbPress Admin > Manage > Topics moved to Wordpress Admin > Manage > Forum Topics
  • bbPress Admin > Manage > Posts moved to Wordpress Admin > Manage > Forum Posts
  • bbPress Admin > Manage > Forums moved to Wordpress Admin > Manage > Forums
  • bbPress Admin > Settings > General moved to Wordpress Admin > Settings > BBPress G
